title: Who's the girl’s voice in GOT7's 'If You Do'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Her name is Lily M.! She’s a trainee still under JYPE, originally rumoured to debut with ITZY but now popular opinion seems to be that shes going to debut as a soloist instead. She signed with JYPE from the show KPOP STAR (the same show where Park Jimin (15&) and Park Jaehyung (DAY6) were also signed into JYPE from) and apparently she’s half-Australian which would explain the slight accent in her part~
